title: I can not transfer file form PC to my PIXEL 3XL device.
content:
I have no problem in my USB Cable. I am using Windows 8. Only the file transfer option not working other options such as PTP, USB Tethering working properly. I've currently running latest Android 10 with March 2020 update. Please help.
Thank You
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
